author: Ainsley Harriott
method: Pour the Irish stout and the condensed milk into a blender and add the ice. Pulse for one minute until light and frothy. To serve, pour into glasses and sprinkle with a little ground cinnamon or freshly grated nutmeg.
ingredients: 500ml/17fl oz Irish stout,  200ml/7fl oz condensed milk,  10 ice cubes,  ground cinnamon or freshly grated nutmeg, for sprinkling
